doc.title: 1001 Arabian Nights: The Adventures of Sinbad
doc.plot: Some call him a womanizer others call him charismatic, some think him a brute others charming but all know one thing - Sinbad is a serious bad-ass! From beautiful women to terrifying creatures to armies of blood thirsty villains, this is one epic fantasy/adventure series that will hook you in and not let go. Bringing back a classic tale in 1001 Arabian Nights and giving them a new updated telling.

Some call him a womanizer others call him charismatic, some think him a brute others charming but all know one thing - Sinbad is a serious bad-ass! From beautiful women to terrifying creatures to armies of blood thirsty villains, this is one epic fantasy/adventure series that will hook you in and not let go. Bringing back a classic tale in 1001 Arabian Nights and giving them a new updated telling.
